descr.p: The coordinate system in MSEgui grids has its origin in the first datarow of the first datacolumn. Fixed rows and columns have negative indices:
descr.pre: . -2 -1 0 1 2 column-index -2 F F F F F -1 F F F F F 0 F F D D D 1 F F D D D 2 F F D D D | + row index
descr.p: The big negative numbers mean "none" or "whole column/row", it is the number constant "invalidaxis" = "-bigint" = -"maxint div 2".
